version_description: • fixed a bug with sharing fotos and videos
• fixed a bug with sharing fotos and videos
• fixed bug with dark mode (disabled it for now)
• fixed bug with dark mode (disabled it for now)

New features:
• students are highlighted to distinguish them from teachers
• disabled users are highlighted to distinguish them from active users
• status message, if connection lost and reconnected
Changes:
• students can't delete their own messages anymore to prevent bullying
• changing groups between public and private is only possible for admins of group
Bugfixes:
• Removed button „add new members“ for groups that are linked with lessons (managed in WebUntis)
